price: Enti hyε nkͻnkͻnsafoͻ no bͻ sε nokorε, wͻn wͻ asotwee a εyεya (paa da hͻ retwεn wͻn).
arabic: بَشِّرِ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ بِأَنَّ لَهُمۡ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: bashiri al-munāfiqīna bi-anna lahum ʿadhāban alīman
